metadata.title: PM pays tribute to security forces for successful operations against terrorists in Tirah

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 16 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Thursday paid tribute to the security forces for conducting successful intelligence-based operations against Fitna-al-Khawarij in Tirah, District Khyber since December 14, 2024. The prime minister, in a press statement commended the security forces for killing 22 terrorists in these operations. The entire nation stands with the security forces in the war against terrorism, PM Shehbaz said. He also expressed the resolve to completely eradicate all forms of terrorism from the country.
